Improvements.Improvement: Use enhanced for loop instead of traditional for loop
Improvements.Change_Diff:
- for (int i=0; i < realArgs.length; i++) {
+ for (Object arg : args) {
Improvements.Description: Instead of using a traditional for loop to iterate over `realArgs`, use an enhanced for loop. This makes the code more concise and eliminates the need for an explicit iterator.

Rather than just throwing the exception, it would be better to log it or handle it in some other way. It might also be useful to distinguish between different types of exceptions instead of catching all Exceptions in one block.
